rows.label: qst104907_msg0001
rows.name:
My dreamy dapperling! Your presence
alone transforms that cheap knock-off
ring into a cherished treasure!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0002
rows.name:
...Terribly sorry. I don't
know what came over me.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0003
rows.name:
Now, what intimate details can
you give me about the moment you
made the Storied Band your own?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0021
rows.name: What should we tell her?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0022
rows.name: Zeke and Rex's teeth were chattering.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0023
rows.name: Zeke and Rex made vows of friendship.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0041
rows.name:
So it was a grueling search in the
freezing cold... I see, I see...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0051
rows.name:
Ahhh! So one man placed the ring upon
the other's finger and swore that never
would they be parted? How wonderful!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0071
rows.name: Thank you, that should be enough.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0072
rows.name:
I believe I've grasped the core
themes for my book now...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0073
rows.name:
Ah...my pen arm... It's
twitching... It wants to
write... I can't...contain it!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0074
rows.name:
I'm going to write for
a bit! Be back later!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0075
rows.name: ...Phew! It's done!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0101
rows.name: "The Flora of Alst"!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0102
rows.name:
Err... Even after hearing your
inspiring stories, the details
didn't quite come together for me...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0103
rows.name:
So I went back to my original
plan and wrote about beautiful
flowers instead.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0201
rows.name: "Gentlemen: A Study"!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0202
rows.name:
A tale of beauty and friendship unraveled
within my imagination as I listened
to your impassioned stories...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0203
rows.name:
And so contrary to even my
expectations, I have written a
book that's chock full of charming men!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0204
rows.name:
I think it'll be a hit! Oh, don't
worry, I've used all the tropes I can
think of that appeal to the masses!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0301
rows.name:
I'll have it published once
I'm finished editing, so
be sure to buy a copy!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0302
rows.name:
Thanks again for all your help.
I've learned all sorts of things!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0303
rows.name:
Plus I got to talk to all you fine
gentlemen. A treat for the eyes as
well as the old brain cells!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0304
rows.name: Incidentally, I'm a woman.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0305
rows.name: Whaaaat?! You mean...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0306
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, it was just your
clothes that made me think...
Beauty is a fickle thing, isn't it?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0401
rows.name:
Ah, my knights in shining armor have
returned... How I long to hear of their
exploits from their own wondrous lips!
